name: Elon Musk
title: The Architect
description: The first node in the network. Drag, rotate, and export your own interpretation of technology's most polarizing figure. A kinetic 3D portrait exploring the duality of innovation and disruption.
lore: In the shadow of rockets and algorithms, one figure rewired the fabric of industry. From electric dreams to neural links, the Architect builds futures most dare not imagine — or fear to inhabit.
medium: Interactive 3D WebGL — Three.js, custom shaders, particle systems

name: Mark Zuckerberg
title: The Connector
tagline: The architect of the social graph
description: The second node activates. A figure who mapped human connection into code and turned identity into currency.
lore: From a dorm room to a digital empire spanning billions of minds. The Connector didn't just build a platform — he rewired the social fabric of civilization, blurring the line between community and surveillance.
medium: Interactive 3D WebGL — Three.js, custom shaders, particle systems

name: Sam Altman
title: The Accelerationist
tagline: Ushering in the age of artificial minds
description: The network expands. A mind that unleashed artificial intelligence on the world and dared humanity to keep up.
lore: With a single deployment, the Accelerationist cracked open Pandora's box of machine cognition. The line between human thought and silicon intelligence dissolved overnight. There is no going back.
medium: Interactive 3D WebGL — Three.js, custom shaders, particle systems

name: Jeff Bezos
title: The Optimizer
description: The penultimate node. An optimizer who bent the arc of commerce, labor, and space itself to his vision of relentless efficiency.
lore: From an online bookstore to the backbone of the internet, from same-day delivery to suborbital flight. The Optimizer turned customer obsession into an empire, and the world into a warehouse.
medium: Interactive 3D WebGL — Three.js, custom shaders, particle systems

name: Jensen Huang
title: The Chipmaker
description: The final node completes the network. The man who forged the silicon brains powering the AI revolution — every neural network runs on his architecture.
lore: While others wrote the software, the Chipmaker built the hardware that made it all possible. From gaming GPUs to the engines of artificial intelligence, his chips became the substrate of a new epoch. The epochalypse is complete.
medium: Interactive 3D WebGL — Three.js, custom shaders, particle systems
